answers.answer: Im anemic and I failed the glucose test the first time...you will have another chance to pass the hour one I beelieve like I did two days ago..and if you fail I believe they will make you take the 3 hour one or restrict your diet

My doctor made me take the three hour test after only being 2 points over on my 1 hour test the 3 hour test must have turned out ok cause i haven't heard anything from the doctor yet. Limit you sugar intake and drink lots and lots of water. Hope you have good luck with your next test.

I failed my 1 hour test by 8 points. I did the 3 hour one 2 weeks later and passed. There's really nothing you can do to avoid not having it...you either have it or you don't.They draw your blood 4 times for the 3 hour test.  If you fail,  you just have to check your sugar levels a few times a day and possibly see a dietician.  You may also be monitored more to make sure your baby doesn't get too big. It's really not a big deal or anything to worry about it. My friend has gestational diabetes and she just has to cut back on the sugar.

question: I got the call today that I have to get retested for glucose and am anemic:(  has anyone home through this. ..what's next? What if I fail again?
title: failed glucose, help nervous
